title: Josep Borrell - Wikipedia
snippet: Josep Borrell Fontelles (Western Catalan: [dʒuˈzɛb boˈreʎ fonˈteʎes]; born 24 April 1947) is a Spanish politician who served as High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy and Vice-President of the European Commission from 2019 to 2024.

title: Borrell Josep | Socialists & Democrats
snippet: Borrell comes to the role High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy with a wealth of political experience both at national and European level. title: Josep Borrell
snippet: Borrell was President of the European Parliament, where from 2007 to 2009 was Chair of the Committee on Development. In Spain, he was a Member of Parliament from 1986 to 2003 and held the position of Minister of Public Works, Transport, ...
